actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution calling for freedom and self-determination for Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia.

summary.text: Requests the President to bring the question of Estonia, Latvia, and Lithuania (the Baltic States) before the United Nations. Directs the United States Information Agency and other United States propaganda agencies to bring such question to world attention. Declares it the sense of Congress that the United States not recognize annexation of these states by the Soviet Union, that the President of the United States should request that maps of the Soviet Union indicate that the United States does not recognize such annexation, and that the United Nations should conduct free elections in nations dominated by the Soviet Union.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution calling for freedom and self-determination for Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia.
